mapper.select: SELECT bo.bgt_org_id, bpss.period_set_code BGT_PERIOD_SET_CODE, bp.period_year BGT_PERIOD_YEAR, bp.period_num BGT_PERIOD_NUM, bp.quarter_num, bp.period_name, bp.start_date, bp.end_date, 'O' bgt_period_status_code FROM bgt_period bp, bgt_organization bo, bgt_period_set bpss WHERE bp.period_set_id = bo.period_set_id AND bo.bgt_org_id = #{bgtOrgId} AND bp.period_set_id = bpss.period_set_id AND bpss.period_set_code = #{bgtPeriodSetCode} AND NOT EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM bgt_org_period_status bps WHERE bps.bgt_period_set_code = bpss.period_set_code AND bps.bgt_org_id = bo.bgt_org_id AND bps.bgt_period_year = bp.period_year AND bps.bgt_period_num = bp.period_num AND bps.bgt_period_status_code = 'C' ) ORDER BY bp.period_year, bp.period_num
